item.title: Pahalgam: Gateway to Alpine Beauty and Pilgrimage in Jammu & Kashmir
item.description:
Introduction

Pahalgam, nestled in the heart of the Kashmir Valley in the Indian Union Territory of Jammu & Kashmir, is a breathtaking hill station renowned for its pristine beauty and serene landscapes. Located approximately 95 kilometers from Srinagar, the summer capital of Jammu & Kashmir, Pahalgam sits at an elevation of 7,200 feet (2,194 meters) above sea level. Itâ€™s a place where the Lidder River meanders through lush green meadows, surrounded by snow-capped mountains, making it a haven for nature lovers and adventure enthusiasts alike. Pahalgam offers a unique blend of tranquility and adventure, providing an unforgettable experience for every visitor.
